text: *** Bug 9764 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
creator: wrowe@apache.org
robertlaferla@attbi.com
text:
Under 2.0.36, the AddLanguage and LanguagePriority directives use "kr" for 
Korean.  It should be "ko"  In MS Internet Explorer, under Tools->Internet
Options->Languages and under Netscape Preferences->Navigator->Languages it is
listed as Korean (ko).

Remarkable... I just committed a fix for this a few hours ago.

Thanks for using Apache.
creator: slive@apache.org
